comments: It was my first photography class & after being instructed by him, I am now minoring in Photography. He truly cares about everyone & how far they come from the beginning of the class to the end. I would say that attendance is not mandatory , but if I were you I would show up, its fun. Also we almost always got our of class an hour or 30 mins early.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (6)  Inspirational (6)  Respected (4)  Amazing lectures (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Caring (2)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I really like Sean as a teacher, my only critique is that in photo 109 he says everyone\'s work is brilliant and in photo209 nobody\'s is. The photos that he always goes absolutely nuts for are the most boring, like a close up of a wrinkled sheet of paper (no joke). Stay away from complex compositions if your looking to specifically please him.

comments: If you want to learn how to light and take good pictures, take this class! The prof is cool and you do lots of shooting during class so there\'s lots of time to practice. I hardly read the textbook cause Mr. Sanders explained everything so well, but I bought it at the end of the semester to review what we learned. A+!!!

comments: He\'s a good teacher but he\'s becoming a bit slack. The class always starts about 20 minutes after it\'s supposed to because he\'s always of doing something else. There\'s a lot of just sitting, waiting for him to get things going and it\'s frustrating since you pay a lot of money for the class. Things you learn in 5 hours could be taught in 3 hours.

comments: A raw of sunshine, that is what he is, a great photographer, inspiring, helpful, friendly. He is one of the best teachers I ever had and I have taken two classes with him - I hope they will invent more so I can have him again! Funny assignments, mind-thrilling inspiration and great In-class-assignments. I learned so much!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (6)  Inspirational (6)  Respected (4)  Amazing lectures (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Caring (2)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Sean really makes the class fun. He is very charming, open and positive. I wish it actually was a little harder to get a good grade, because he is an easy A, but it still is a lot of good assignments so you can be creative. And of course he is super cute. Last semester the class stayed even though we were allowed to go home. He is awesome.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (6)  Inspirational (6)  Respected (4)  Amazing lectures (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Caring (2)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I entered the class with a nonchalant attitude hoping I could just take all my pictures with my iPhone 4. By the end I loved photography enough to by a $600 Canon. Sean\'s an amazing teacher!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (6)  Inspirational (6)  Respected (4)  Amazing lectures (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Caring (2)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Was hesitant to take the class but am so glad I took it because of what an absolutely fantastic teacher he is. Always smiling always a positive attitude. Really grateful for the experience I had and for what I learned in that class, and I was pretty closed-minded at the beginning.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (6)  Inspirational (6)  Respected (4)  Amazing lectures (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Caring (2)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Sanders is my favorite teacher I have ever had. His classes are perfect for learning technical photography and he even incorporates the artistic, conceptual side of photography into his classes. YOU WILL LOVE PHOTOGRAPHY AFTER TAKING HIS CLASSES GUARANTEED!!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (6)  Inspirational (6)  Respected (4)  Amazing lectures (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Caring (2)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: He is the best teacher of the photography dpt.His classes are interesting and fun. He really knows how to give a five hour lesson without getting you bored.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (6)  Inspirational (6)  Respected (4)  Amazing lectures (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Caring (2)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Seantel is so cool! He could probably teach anything with that great attitude and smile. He is passionate and really easy to talk to. Cares about students and knows so much about the industry. He is the best professor in the whole Photo Dept. Class can be long but he is a pleasure to listen to. Grading is really fair and he is inspiring!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (6)  Inspirational (6)  Respected (4)  Amazing lectures (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Caring (2)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Seantel subbed in my class for a day and it was so much better than my regular teacher, Linda Lowell. He was able to teach the class concepts in a matter of hours what Linda couldn\'t for months. He always has a smile, remembers you after meeting once, and helps students that aren\'t even his own. Smart, handsome, and very talented!!! Take him!
